com.compendium.ui.toolbars.system
Interface IUIToolBarManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
UIToolBarManager
public interface IUIToolBarManager

This interface contains the required methods to be supported by any class wishing to be a UIToolBarManager

Method Summary
 void addFloatingToolBar(UIToolBarFloater floater)
          Tell the manager that a toolbar is now floating by passing the UIToolBarFloater object to it.
 UIToolBarController getBottomToolBarController()
          Returns the toolbar controller for the bottom edge of the container
 UIToolBarController getLeftToolBarController()
          Returns the toolbar controller for the left edge of the container
 UIToolBarController getRightToolBarController()
          Returns the toolbar controller for the right edge of the container
 javax.swing.JFrame getToolBarFloatFrame()
          Returns the JFrame in which is to be the parent of the floating toolbars
 java.lang.String getToolbarXML()
          Returns a xml string containing the toolbar data from the toolbar controllers The UIToolBarController class has a toXML method that can be used to get this information.
 UIToolBarController getTopToolBarController()
          Returns the toolbar controller for the top edge of the container
 void removeFloatingToolBar(UIToolBarFloater floater)
          Tell the manager that a toolbar is now docked by removing the UIToolBarFloater object from it.

getToolBarFloatFrame

javax.swing.JFrame getToolBarFloatFrame()
Returns the JFrame in which is to be the parent of the floating toolbars

JFrame which represents the parent of the floating toolbars

getRightToolBarController

getToolbarXML

java.lang.String getToolbarXML()
Returns a xml string containing the toolbar data from the toolbar controllers The UIToolBarController class has a toXML method that can be used to get this information.

Returns:
a String object containing formatted xml representation of the toolbar data

addFloatingToolBar

void addFloatingToolBar(UIToolBarFloater floater)
Tell the manager that a toolbar is now floating by passing the UIToolBarFloater object to it.

Parameters:
UIToolBarFloater - floater, the floating toolbar to add.

removeFloatingToolBar

void removeFloatingToolBar(UIToolBarFloater floater)
Tell the manager that a toolbar is now docked by removing the UIToolBarFloater object from it.

Parameters:
UIToolBarFloater - floater, the floating toolbar to remove.
